name: Learning Mindset Inventory
description: Evaluates growth vs. fixed mindset orientation, resilience, and attitudes toward learning challenges.

items.stem: You can always substantially change how intelligent you are.
Your intelligence is something about you that you can't change very much.
When I fail at something, I tend to give up quickly.
When faced with a difficult problem, what is your typical approach?
options: I work harder and try different strategies
I ask for help from others
I give up if it's too challenging

items.stem: You receive poor feedback on an important project. Your colleague suggests that you're just not cut out for this type of work. How do you respond?
options: Accept their assessment and consider changing roles
Work harder to improve and prove them wrong
Ignore the feedback and continue as before

items.stem: Making mistakes is an essential part of learning.
